name: Chrome (Prototype)
description:
Chrome is a simple 2D platformer that treats colour as a puzzle piece, under one simple rule: "White goes through black, black goes through white". By switching between the two colours, the player can pass through previously blocked terrain to avoid traps, and reach their destination safely.

This project was a remade university project and made in just over a week in Unity 2D

Known issue:

Coin collection sound is a bit bugged. Not sure how to fix without just removing the sound.
